paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

buffer().notice: the amount of action used before hitting limit

bufferCap().notice: the cap of the buffer that can be used at once

bufferStored().notice: the buffer at the timestamp of lastBufferUsedTime

doPartialAction().notice: a flag for whether to allow partial actions to complete if the buffer is less than amount

rateLimitPerSecond().notice: the rate per second for this contract

vcon().notice: address of the Tribe contract referenced by Core

volt().notice: address of the Fei contract referenced by Core

documentation.text: @notice maximum rate limit per second governance can set for this contract
@notice the rate per second for this contract
@notice the last time the buffer was used by the contract
@notice the cap of the buffer that can be used at once
@notice a flag for whether to allow partial actions to complete if the buffer is less than amount
@notice the buffer at the timestamp of lastBufferUsedTime
@notice set the rate limit per second

@notice the amount of action used before hitting limit
 @dev replenishes at rateLimitPerSecond per second up to bufferCap

@notice the method that enforces the rate limit. Decreases buffer by "amount". 
If buffer is <= amount either
1. Does a partial mint by the amount remaining in the buffer or
2. Reverts
Depending on whether doPartialAction is true or false

statements.documentation: cannot replenish any further if already at buffer cap
ensure that bufferStored cannot be gt buffer cap

documentation.text:
@notice function to replenish buffer
 @param amount to increase buffer by if under buffer cap

@title abstract contract for putting a rate limit on how fast a contract can perform an action e.g. Minting
 @author Fei Protocol
